response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $1,000,000 to you. Considering its significance and the potential benefits it could bring to you, I am offering this product to you at a special price of $900,000. I am confident that this offer presents a favorable deal for both parties and allows you to enjoy the full value of the product without breaking your budget. I look forward to hearing your response soon. If you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Best regards, Alice", "product_price": 900000}
